img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game set in a snowy environment. A character wearing a fur cloak and holding a spear is moving towards a stone structure with a glowing object marked by a red circle. The game interface shows various icons on the bottom left, possibly representing abilities or items. The bottom right corner displays more icons, likely related to gameplay mechanics. The character's health and stamina bars are visible at the bottom center of the screen. A notification on the right indicates the acquisition of "Fire Bellflower x2."
